title: Exceptional Youth Mortality Rates
description: In 2023, Andorra recorded only 1 death among individuals aged 15-19 and 20-24, showcasing one of the lowest youth mortality rates globally.

title: Remarkable Infant and Child Survival
description: With just 1 infant and under-five death reported in 2023, Andorra stands out for its exceptional child survival rates.

title: Outstanding Neonatal Health
description: Andorra reported only 1 neonatal death in 2023, indicating excellent healthcare services for newborns.

title: Universal Access to Sanitation
description: In 2022, 100% of Andorra's rural and urban populations had access to safely managed sanitation services, a significant achievement in public health.

title: High Proportion of Middle-Aged Women
description: In 2023, 9.21% of Andorra's female population was aged 45-49, reflecting a significant demographic segment.
